security: The document references 'Michael Stratton' and the 'Fair Play for Cuba Committee,' which may relate to sensitive investigations or operations. Revealing these names in connection with specific memos could potentially expose individuals or compromise past intelligence activities.
summary: This document appears to be a collection of memorandum references related to Michael Stratton and the Fair Play for Cuba Committee, duplicated in other memos.
summary_one_paragraph: This document lists memorandum references pertaining to Michael Stratton and his involvement with the Fair Play for Cuba Committee. The references include memos dated 2/16/61, 3/8/61, 3/18/61, 10/17/61, and 10/15/61. It is noted that the 10/15/61 memorandum is a duplicate of another memo.
title: Memorandum References: Michael Stratton and Fair Play for Cuba Committee
